message: I just created a new video to demo my site concept. What do you guys think?

That's really interesting (especially to a languages nerd like me.) My main interest would be to improve my language skills though and it wasn't clear how having sentences automatically translated for me would help with that.

The idea is you would have practice speaking in a different language. And when you become unsure of how to say something, you would have a translated version. So one of the future features we would be implementing is to let you speak with a random person in a language of your choosing.
